fields.title: What is Red Hat OpenShift?
fields.text: Red Hat® OpenShift® is an enterprise-ready Kubernetes container platform with full-stack automated operations to manage hybrid cloud, multicloud, and edge deployments. Red Hat OpenShift is optimized to improve developer productivity and promote innovation. Red Hat OpenShift is available as a fully managed cloud service on leading public clouds, or as a self-managed software offering for organizations requiring more customization.

fields.title: What is Kubernetes?
fields.text: Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
